statements: SELECT * FROM TeachingMethods
SELECT id, method_name FROM TeachingMethods ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM TeachingMethods WHERE effectiveness_rating > 4.5
SELECT method_name, effectiveness_rating FROM TeachingMethods ORDER BY method_name ASC
SELECT * FROM TeachingMethods LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM TeachingMethods WHERE id = 1;
SELECT method_name, effectiveness_rating FROM TeachingMethods WHERE effectiveness_rating > 4.5;
SELECT id, method_name FROM TeachingMethods WHERE method_name LIKE '%active%';
SELECT * FROM TeachingMethods ORDER BY effectiveness_rating DESC;
SELECT method_name, AVG(effectiveness_rating) AS average_rating FROM TeachingMethods GROUP BY method_name HAVING AVG(effectiveness_rating) > 3.5;
SELECT * FROM Teaching_Methods;
SELECT method_name, description FROM Teaching_Methods WHERE method_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Student_Evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT method_name, evaluation_score FROM Teaching_Methods JOIN Student_Evaluations ON Teaching_Methods.method_id = Student_Evaluations.method_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_evaluations FROM Student_Evaluations WHERE evaluation_score > 8;
SELECT * FROM Student_Evaluations WHERE evaluation_score > 4 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT method_name, description FROM Teaching_Methods WHERE method_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY method_name;
SELECT student_id, method_id, AVG(evaluation_score) AS average_score FROM Student_Evaluations GROUP BY student_id, method_id;
SELECT * FROM Teaching_Methods WHERE method_name LIKE 'A%' AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT method_id, COUNT(evaluation_id) AS total_evaluations FROM Student_Evaluations GROUP BY method_id HAVING COUNT(evaluation_id) >= 3 ORDER BY total_evaluations DESC;
SELECT * FROM TeachingMethods;
SELECT method_name, description FROM TeachingMethods WHERE method_id = 1;
SELECT method_id, method_name FROM TeachingMethods ORDER BY method_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentFeedback WHERE student_id = 101;
SELECT student_name, age, grade_level FROM Students WHERE grade_level = 'Junior';
SELECT * FROM TeachingMethods;
SELECT method_name, description FROM TeachingMethods ORDER BY method_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, age, grade_level FROM Students WHERE age > 20;

SELECT student_name, method_name, feedback FROM Students JOIN StudentFeedback ON Students.student_id = StudentFeedback.student_id JOIN TeachingMethods ON StudentFeedback.method_id = TeachingMethods.method_id;

SELECT method_name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM StudentFeedback JOIN TeachingMethods ON StudentFeedback.method_id = TeachingMethods.method_id GROUP BY method_name ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
SELECT * FROM teaching_methods;
SELECT method_id, method_name FROM teaching_methods;
SELECT method_name, description FROM teaching_methods;
SELECT method_name, description FROM teaching_methods ORDER BY method_name DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, method_name, feedback_text FROM teacher_feedback JOIN teaching_methods ON teacher_feedback.method_id = teaching_methods.method_id;
SELECT * FROM teaching_methods;
SELECT method_name, description FROM teaching_methods WHERE method_id = 3;
SELECT teacher_name, feedback_text FROM teachers t JOIN teacher_feedback tf ON t.teacher_id = tf.teacher_id WHERE tf.method_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, score FROM student_scores WHERE method_id = 1 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM teaching_methods WHERE method_name LIKE '%active%'
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, age, gender, grade_level FROM students WHERE age > 15;
SELECT class_name, teacher_name, student_count FROM classes WHERE student_count < 20 ORDER BY student_count DESC;
SELECT method_name, method_description FROM teaching_methods WHERE method_id = 3;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_type, score FROM assessments WHERE score >= 80 ORDER BY score DESC, assessment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM teaching_methods WHERE method_name = 'Lecture';
SELECT student_name, age, gender FROM students WHERE grade_level = 10 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT class_name, teacher_name, student_count FROM classes WHERE student_count > 20;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_type, score FROM assessments WHERE score >= 90 ORDER BY assessment_type ASC;
SELECT student_name, result_date, result_description FROM students JOIN results ON students.student_id = results.student_id WHERE result_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
